description: Prompts for each sector. Sectors are named by row (T=top, M=middle, B=bottom) and column (L=left, C=center, R=right).
default: add more detail, photorealistic, seamless blend

sectors.TL: add a small colorful bird in the upper left corner, photorealistic, natural lighting
sectors.TC: add fluffy clouds in the upper center, photorealistic, soft lighting
sectors.TR: add a butterfly in the upper right, photorealistic, delicate details
sectors.ML: add green foliage on the left side, photorealistic, natural colors
sectors.MC: enhance the center with more bananas, photorealistic, same style
sectors.MR: add a small flower on the right side, photorealistic, vibrant colors
sectors.BL: add fallen leaves in the lower left, photorealistic, autumn colors
sectors.BC: add a subtle shadow in the lower center, photorealistic
sectors.BR: add a small ladybug in the lower right corner, photorealistic, detailed
